q.about: A UTF-8, URL-encoded search query of 500 characters maximum, including operators.

geocode.about: Returns tweets by users located within a given radius of the given latitude/longitude.

lang.about: Restricts tweets to the given language.

count.about: The number of tweets to return per page, up to a maximum of 100.

until.about: Returns tweets created before the given date. the search index has a 7-day limit.

user.about: Search for a person (if they allow their name to be searched for).

place.about: Search for a place. You can narrow your search to a specific location and distance by adding the center parameter (with latitude and longitude) and an optional distance parameter (in meters):

placetopic.about: Returns a list of possible place Page topics and their IDs. Use with topic_filter=all parameter to get the full list.
